body:
HI,

While running grpc hello world program I am facing this issue, please help
me in this:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "greeter_client.py", line 48, in <module>
    run()
  File "greeter_client.py", line 43, in run
    response = stub.SayHello(helloworld_pb2.HelloRequest(name='you'))
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/grpc/_channel.py", line 507,
in __call__
    return _end_unary_response_blocking(state, call, False, deadline)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/grpc/_channel.py", line 455,
in _end_unary_response_blocking
    raise _Rendezvous(state, None, None, deadline)
grpc._channel._Rendezvous: <_Rendezvous of RPC that terminated with
(StatusCode.UNAVAILABLE, Connect Failed)>



Regards,
Anoop


On Tue, Aug 8, 2017 at 10:35 AM, Remi Collet <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> /usr/include/php-zts/php/Zend/../TSRM/TSRM.h:164:57: error: 'tsrm_ls' undeclared (first use in this function)
>  #define TSRMG(id, type, element) (((type) (*((void ***) tsrm_ls))[TSRM_UNSHUFFLE_RSRC_ID(id)])->element)
>                                                          ^
> /usr/include/php-zts/php/Zend/zend_hash.h:110:28: note: in definition of macro 'zend_hash_update'
>    _zend_hash_add_or_update(ht, arKey, nKeyLength, pData, nDataSize, pDest, HASH_UPDATE ZEND_FILE_LINE_CC)
>                             ^~
> /builddir/build/BUILD/php-pecl-grpc-1.4.3/ZTS/src/php/ext/grpc/channel.c:188:3: note: in expansion of macro 'PHP_GRPC_PERSISTENT_LIST_UPDATE'
>    PHP_GRPC_PERSISTENT_LIST_UPDATE(&EG(persistent_list), key, key_len,
>    ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> /usr/include/php-zts/php/Zend/zend_globals_macros.h:45:16: note: in expansion of macro 'TSRMG'
>  # define EG(v) TSRMG(executor_globals_id, zend_executor_globals *, v)
>                 ^~~~~
> /builddir/build/BUILD/php-pecl-grpc-1.4.3/ZTS/src/php/ext/grpc/channel.c:188:36: note: in expansion of macro 'EG'
>    PHP_GRPC_PERSISTENT_LIST_UPDATE(&EG(persistent_list), key, key_len,
>                                     ^~
> /usr/include/php-zts/php/Zend/../TSRM/TSRM.h:164:57: note: each undeclared identifier is reported only once for each function it appears in
>  #define TSRMG(id, type, element) (((type) (*((void ***) tsrm_ls))[TSRM_UNSHUFFLE_RSRC_ID(id)])->element)
>                                                          ^
> /usr/include/php-zts/php/Zend/zend_hash.h:110:28: note: in definition of macro 'zend_hash_update'
>    _zend_hash_add_or_update(ht, arKey, nKeyLength, pData, nDataSize, pDest, HASH_UPDATE ZEND_FILE_LINE_CC)
>                             ^~
> /builddir/build/BUILD/php-pecl-grpc-1.4.3/ZTS/src/php/ext/grpc/channel.c:188:3: note: in expansion of macro 'PHP_GRPC_PERSISTENT_LIST_UPDATE'
>    PHP_GRPC_PERSISTENT_LIST_UPDATE(&EG(persistent_list), key, key_len,
>    ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> /usr/include/php-zts/php/Zend/zend_globals_macros.h:45:16: note: in expansion of macro 'TSRMG'
>  # define EG(v) TSRMG(executor_globals_id, zend_executor_globals *, v)
>                 ^~~~~
> /builddir/build/BUILD/php-pecl-grpc-1.4.3/ZTS/src/php/ext/grpc/channel.c:188:36: note: in expansion of macro 'EG'
>    PHP_GRPC_PERSISTENT_LIST_UPDATE(&EG(persistent_list), key, key_len,
>                                     ^~
> /builddir/build/BUILD/php-pecl-grpc-1.4.3/ZTS/src/php/ext/grpc/channel.c: At top level:
> cc1: error: unrecognized command line option '-Wno-parentheses-equality' [-Werror]
> cc1: all warnings being treated as errors
>
> â€”
> You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/12114>, or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AEfC33RMT1yErQ3sdyVK3LyT0ni9mk5Oks5sV-yjgaJpZM4OwP8T>
> .
>
@anoopmv your problem is cleary unrelated to this issue
Thanks for the bug report and the PR. I am fixing a few other issues with 1.4.3 in #12108.
